text: |Strategic Housing Land Availability Assessment|SHLAA|An assessment produced by the Greater London Authority which identifies a future supply of land that is suitable, available and achievable for housing and economic development uses over the plan period.| |Strategic Flood Risk Assessment|SFRA|A study which assesses the risk to an area from flooding form all sources, now and in the future, taking into consideration the impacts of climate change, to assess the cumulative impact that land use changes and developments in the area will have on flood risk.|
